Commonwealth Unity Fund

Super PAC (Independent Expenditure-Only) - Unauthorized | ID: C00875856 | Registration date: April 11, 2024
Super PAC aimed at supporting Republican John Deaton in his campaign to oust Democratic Massachusetts Senator and outspoken crypto opponent Elizabeth Warren.
Commonwealth Unity Fund has raised
$2,623,734
They have spent
$2,111,270
of it so far.
